author: David Laris
method: Pour the olives into a bowl. Add enough olive oil to coat the olives. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well.  Either serve immediately or transfer the olives back to the jar and store in the fridge for 2-3 days. Experiment by trying alternatives, such as lemon rind, oregano stalks, celery, carrots, peppercorns, bay leaves, or any of your favourite ingredients.
ingredients: 1 bottle olives in brine, drained,  1 tbsp vinegar,  olive oil,  1 garlic clove, peeled, sliced,  1 chilli, sliced,  handful fresh basil leaves
